name: TriJam 85: Hard and Fast
description:
Drop HARD or soft objects at a FAST or slow pace.  See how high you can settle a soft object.

Music: Bensound.com - true artists' creations live here.

SFX: ZapSplat.com - tons o' great beeps and crashes.

I tried making my own music and SFX and realized that I do not have 4 years to get some talent in these areas.
